text: Favorites are now available on iOS. Add/Remove from Favorites any item in your Safe.
Favorites are fully synced across devices, also available when you are in Gallery view.
Tap on a push notification to go to the exact message even when Sharekey is closed.
Improved sharing from another app to Sharekey.
Improved UX of the Search when adding Members to a Channel or a File/Folder.
Tap on a push notification to go to the exact message even when Sharekey is closed.
Long tap on the Member’s Key (QR Code) to download it.
